attributes.action: introduce legislation that all motorists must allow a minimum of 3 feet in distance between their vehicle and a cyclist that they drive past
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is an American pressure group that is campaigning to introduce legislation to allow 3 foot in distance between all motor vehicles and cyclists. So far, they have managed to introduce this Law in 11 US States and also France. There is a Global movement towards the introduction of this Law. The Government is currently introducing many pro-cycling policies and this one MUST be included. It's really just a matter of when rather than if so please support this cause. Many thanks.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "introduce legislation that all motorists must allow a minimum of 3 feet in distance between their vehicle and a cyclist that they drive past."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
